---
title: "빈도, 심도 선형회귀"
date: "2023/10/24"
author: "Sungil Park"
description: "2023-2학기 R로 하는 금융데이터분석"
---




## Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data_bin <- readxl::read_xlsx("contents/2. 예측수준의 결정.xlsx",sheet = 2)
data_sim <- readxl::read_xlsx("contents/2. 예측수준의 결정.xlsx",sheet = 3)

data_bin %>% head()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 6 × 7
      t  year  quat in1_bin mul_bin jas_bin cha_bin
  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>
1     1  2016     1    5.71    8.42    0.95    15.8
2     2  2016     2    6.16    8.2     0.75    14.6
3     3  2016     3    6.54    8.73    0.78    15.4
4     4  2016     4    6.64    9.01    0.87    15.4
5     5  2017     1    5.88    9.06    1.05    16.7
6     6  2017     2    6.02    8.41    0.61    14.0
```
:::
:::



## 분기별 R-squared
 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg <- function(x){
  rsq <- summary(lm(x ~ t + factor(quat), data = data_bin))$r.squared
  print(rsq)
}

lin_reg(data_bin$in1_bin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.9055443
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_bin$mul_bin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.9156786
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_bin$jas_bin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.4214575
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_bin$cha_bin)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.7271797
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg_2 <- function(x){
  rsq <- summary(lm(x ~ t + factor(quat), data = data_sim))$r.squared
  print(rsq)
}

lin_reg(data_sim$in1_sim)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8562366
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_sim$mul_sim)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8859307
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_sim$jas_sim)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.7132966
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_sim$cha_sim)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8723479
```
:::
:::



## t R-squared
 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg <- function(x){
  rsq <- summary(lm(x ~ t, data = data_bin))$r.squared
  print(rsq)
}

lin_reg(data_bin$in1_bin)
```


```{.r .cell-code}
lin_reg(data_bin$mul_bin)
```

## 중간고사 분포

"0 ~ 10"  =  2,
"10 ~ 20" =   2,
"20 ~ 30" =   2,
"30 ~ 40" =   2,
"40 ~ 50" =   3,
"50 ~ 60" =   2,
"60 ~ 70" =   3,   
"70 ~ 80" =   4,   
'80 ~ 90' =   2
